attributes.title: $750 Ralph Lauren Jeans
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by zwarg on Sourcemap.org:

The description of how a $750 pair of jeans is made by a former designer for Ralph Lauren. Description taken from NPR transcript of 'Fresh Air', 10/26/2009
